ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers dark spiced rum
des: "Bring the taste of the tropics home to wherever you live with this boater's favorite drink. Be careful because they can creep up on you! You can use ginger ale if you need to but real ginger beer is what makes this drink special. You can stir it if you want to or enjoy the layers of ginger and rum."
ins: Fill a highball glass with ice; add ginger beer. Slowly pour rum over ginger beer and garnish glass with lime slice.
